subject: Economy
question_en: What is the role of the Central Bank of India in the economy?
question_hi: भारत की कैंटरल बैंक का भारत के एक्सेय में क्या भूमिका है ?
A_en: Regulating bank rates and monetary policy
A_hi: राजनीतिक मनोकॉल्प्रोजेन थिएसन और बैंक रेज़निक एडेंट्स
explanation_en: The Central Bank of India is responsible for monitoring inflation and managing the currency. Its role includes controlling the money supply in the economy and maintaining the value of the Indian rupee. The Reserve Bank of India (RBI) also plays a crucial role in providing credit to industries.
explanation_hi: भारतीय कंप्याता का मॉडल या फ़ाइनिक कॉर्पॅन
explanation_en: The role of the Reserve Bank of India (RBI) includes monitoring inflation and managing the currency. It is responsible for controlling the money supply in the economy and ensuring the stability of the Indian rupee. RBI also plays a significant part in providing credit to industries.
